text: Be Happy may refer to: * Be Happy (TV series), a 2011 Singaporean TV series * Be Happy (Rina Aiuchi album), 2001 * Be Happy, a 1999 album by Yurisangja * "Be Happy" (Mary J. Blige song), 1993 * "Be Happy" (Dixie D'Amelio song), 2020 * "Be Happy", a song by Personz ==See also== * Don't Worry, Be Happy (disambiguation) * "Sameach" ("Be Happy"), the Israeli entry in the Eurovision Song Contest 2000
title: Be Happy
